notificationMessage: Welcome to the new version of my website powered by Next.js 15 and Shadcn.
greeting: Hello, I'm a student at Tecnologico de Monterrey based in Mexico!
aboutMeDescription: I'm an independent developer who tries to learn according to my needs or projects that I have in mind so that I can become a full-stack developer in the near future. I'm currently based in Monterrey studying Data Science and Mathematics focused mainly on artificial intelligence. At the moment I work at Tecnologico de Monterrey as a Data Analysis intern, however I'm open to new offers.
